name: @Align_Centers
author: AFNI Developers
description: Moves the center of a dataset (DSET) to the center of a base volume (BASE) and optionally creates a transform matrix.

inputs.description: Base volume, typically a template. Can also specify RAI coordinates for center alignment.
inputs.name: Base Volume

inputs.description: Dataset to be aligned to BASE.
inputs.name: Dataset

inputs.description: Additional datasets (originally in register with DSET) that should be shifted in the same way.
inputs.name: Child Datasets

inputs.description: Echo all commands to terminal for debugging.
inputs.name: Echo Flag

inputs.description: Custom prefix for the result files.
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: Only output the transform needed to align the centers without shifting any child volumes.
inputs.name: 1D Matrix Only Flag

inputs.description: Like -1Dmat_only, but no datasets are created or changed.
inputs.name: 1D Matrix Only No Dataset Flag

inputs.description: Do not create new data; shift existing ones. Use with caution.
inputs.name: No Copy Flag

inputs.description: Center is that of the volume's grid (default).
inputs.name: Center Grid Flag

inputs.description: Center is the center of mass of the volume.
inputs.name: Center of Mass Flag
Center of Mass No Automask Flag

inputs.description: Apply shift translation from a 1D file.
inputs.name: Shift Transform File

inputs.description: Apply inverse of shift translation from a 1D file.
inputs.name: Shift Transform Inverse File

output-files.description: Transform matrix needed for the shift applied to DSET.
output-files.name: Transform Matrix File

output-files.description: Shifted Dataset aligned with the base volume.
output-files.name: Shifted Dataset File

output-files.description: Shifted child datasets aligned with the base volume.
output-files.name: Shifted Child Datasets File
